metadata.description: Comprehensive user stories derived from the 2.0 Tech Plan, Financial Strategy, AI Monetization, and Legal Directives, covering all 17 stakeholder roles.

user_stories.story: I want a clean, modular dashboard to view my real-time spins, SMR data, and rankings, so that I can accurately track my performance.
I want a unified Roster Management view, so that I can track and report analytics across all my artists efficiently.
I want to see my NGN Score Influence Weighting status boost, so that I can know the non-monetary benefit of being a community investor.

(New: Engagement Source Breakdown) I want my Post Analytics to display engagement (views, likes, shares) split between **Authenticated (Logged-in) Users** and **Anonymous/Session Traffic**, so that I can understand the quality and source of the data feeding my Engagement Quality Score (EQS).
I want to complete Stripe Connect onboarding, so that I can receive Engagement Royalty and Commerce payouts compliantly.

(Revised: EQS Transparency) I want to view my estimated and finalized Engagement Quality Score (EQS) earnings, including a transparent line-item breakdown showing the **Historical Fraud Rate (HFR)**, **Reputation Multiplier (0.8-1.2)**, and the **Net Engagement Value**, so that I can audit my payout calculation and understand how to improve my Trust Score.
I want to generate and export royalty statements and contracts, so that I can accurately distribute funds to my artists.

(New: Fan Subscriptions Setup) I want a configuration page to **select approved Fan Tier price points (Gold/Silver)** and manage the benefits offered, so that I can monetize my loyal fan base compliantly.

(New: Content Gating UI) I want a clear **"Gated Content" toggle/dropdown** in the Post Composer UI, so that I can easily restrict posts or media to Fan Subscription tiers (Gold/Silver) before publishing.

(New: Contract Track Array) When uploading a contract (Phase 9), I must be required to provide a mandatory **NGN Track ID Array** associated with the document, so that the Royalty Engine can accurately match the contract's splits and recoupment terms to the corresponding royalty events (spins/engagements).
I want to use the AI Content Calendar, so that I can easily generate a 30-day posting schedule based on my NGN Score trends.
I want to use the Release Timing Optimizer (5 Sparks), so that I can identify the optimal day and time to drop new content based on data insights.
I want to generate ad copy variants (3 Sparks) for social media campaigns, so that I can run effective A/B tests on the NGN Ads Platform.

(Revised: Merch Submission) I want a **Merch Submission Form** to upload my artwork and select from NGN's predefined, universally-priced product catalog, so that I can dropship merch without setting prices, maintaining NGN's margin and brand integrity.
I want to implement inventory routing logic, so that NGN can prefer in-house stock over Printful to maximize margin (Phase 10.2).
I want to access venue availability windows and basic routing profiles (likely for a fee or subscription), so that I can plan and submit holds for my own tours without a manager.
I want a dedicated portal for real-time spin entry with track/artist autocomplete, so that I can log my airplay instantly and accurately.
(Revised: Station Spin Data) I want to upload my **Spin Data (CSV/XLSX)** in bulk, and save a persistent column mapping profile, so that my future ingestion is fast and requires minimal training.
I want access to the PLN Playlist Builder with automated Geo-blocking, so that I can ensure I am legally compliant based on track licensing territory.
I want to use the Ad Integration API, so that I can run my own ads and retain 100% of my revenue.
We must design an automated, auditable, and immutable Legal Playback Log, so that we can meet indefinite retention requirements for PRO/publisher reporting.
I want the AI Playlist Optimizer, so that I can re-sequence my PLN playlist to maximize listener retention.

We must implement a **Qualified Listen** definition (30 seconds continuous playback) for all PLN streams, so that the 'Listeners' count in the Legal Playback Log is auditable and compliant for PRO reporting.

I want a dedicated toggle in my CMS to **opt-in or opt-out** of NGN Ad monetization, and a line-item report in my analytics showing the **50% revenue share split**, so that I maintain control and transparency over my earnings.

(New: BYOS Legal & Geo-Controls) I must be required to check a mandatory **Strict Legal Indemnity Clause** checkbox *before* uploading BYOS content, and I must select my **Broadcast Territory Declaration** (e.g., Worldwide/Specific Countries), so that NGN transfers legal liability and satisfies audit requirements.

(New: Auto-DJ Failover Mandate) I want a mandatory **"Failover Playlist ID"** field in my CMS Playback Settings to designate a specific PLN playlist that the **Auto-DJ/Failover Logic** must switch to instantly if my live stream or scheduler fails, guaranteeing continuous, legally compliant broadcast.
I want the Booking Offer Optimizer AI, so that I can generate an initial offer (guarantee vs. door split) based on historical sales and NGN Score.
I want to request the NGN Safety Badge (BFL 3.4), so that I can signal verification and trust to touring artists and fans.

(New: Badge Status Visibility) I want a dedicated section in my Venue Console to clearly display my NGN Safety Badge status (**Verified**, **Pending**, **Revoked**) and view the last verification date, so that I can maintain my trust score.

(New: Annual Recertification) I must complete a mandatory **Annual Recertification Workflow** (including re-acceptance of the liability waiver and a data audit review) to maintain my NGN Safety Badge **Verified** status.

(New: Printable Badge Assets) I want to download high-resolution, branded, and legally disclaimed NGN Safety Badge printables (e.g., posters, stickers) directly from my console, so that I can promote my verified status in-person.

(New: PPV Expense Submission) I want a workflow to upload itemized **Deductible Expenses** (e.g., crew, rental fees) with mandatory receipt files and submit them for approval, so that I can finalize my PPV Net Splits calculation.
I want to set up Pay-Per-View (PPV) events and pricing tiers, so that I can monetize my livestreams and VOD content.
I want playback protected by signed URLs and concurrency limits, so that the PPV content is secure and unauthorized sharing is prevented.
I want a route planning tool with venue availability windows, so that I can efficiently schedule and propose tours.
I want to be listed in the NGN Pro Marketplace, so that Artists/Labels can find and hire me based on NGN Score and genre.

(Revised: AI Disclaimer) When using the AI Mix Feedback Assistant (15 Sparks), I must be presented with the legal disclaimer **before payment** and **on the final report**, confirming the analysis is **for informational purposes only** and that NGN disclaims all liability.
I want a self-serve platform to set up ad campaigns (CPM/CPC), so that I can efficiently buy display and audio inventory across NGN.
I want reporting that includes Invalid Traffic Rate metrics, so that I can ensure my impressions are validated by the EQS anti-fraud measures (BFL 1.4).
I want to select specific targeting based on geo, genre, and placement type, so that I can reach my desired emerging artist segment audience.

(New: NGN Score Targeting) I must be able to filter my campaign audience using the **NGN Score Range** (e.g., users who primarily view content from artists with a Score < 30) and highly granular **Geo-Targeting (Country, State/Province, City/Metro)**, so that I can precisely reach the emerging artist segment.

(Revised: DMCA Logging Schema) I need a mandatory, auditable log of the following data points for every DMCA Takedown Notice received, so that NGN can prove **Receipt Timestamp**, **Reporter Information**, **Perjury Statement Flag**, **Takedown Timestamp**, and **Action Taken** to maintain Safe Harbor status.
I want to run a third-party EQS Audit, so that we can validate fund allocation integrity and achieve **Audit Passed (Zero Fatal Errors)** status (BFL 2.4).
I want a structured queue to manually review and resolve unknown tracks and artists, so that data ingestion from SMR uploads is accurate.
I want to use the BYOS Content Review tool (transcription check), so that I can mitigate high legal risk by auditing user-uploaded shows for profanity or copyrighted terms.
I want to view a dashboard of all Commerce Commissions and Payouts, so that I can reconcile revenue splits from dropshipping and in-house fulfillment.

(New: Commerce Pricing Control) I want a centralized product catalog management tool to **define the universal pricing, commission rules, and product types** (e.g., T-Shirt, Poster) for all Printful-sourced merch, so that NGN ensures price parity and controls the profit profit margin across all creator shops.

(New: Sponsorship LOI Tracker) I want a Sponsorship LOI Management Tool to track BFL 1.1 progress, including the **Sponsor ID**, **Committed LOI Value**, **Targeted Genre/Scene**, and **LOI Status (Signed/Executed)**, so that NGN can audit progress against the `$50K+ Committed LOI Value` KPI and segment the initial Engagement Royalty Pool.

(New: SMR ML KPI Tracker) I want the SMR Ingestion Dashboard to display the **Auto-Mapping Accuracy Rate** of the ML heuristics, so that we can track our **90% KPI** for repeat SMR formats and ensure the system's training is effective.

(New: COGS Line-Item Logging) I need the system to log the **Base Product Cost**, **Print/Embroidery Cost**, **Transaction Fees**, **Packaging & Label Cost**, and **Actual Shipping Cost Paid** per order item, so that NGN can accurately calculate the True COGS necessary to validate the **60%+ Net Margin** KPI for In-House DTG CAPEX.

(New: PPV License Acquisition) The **highest-priority task** is to secure the **Digital Public Performance License (or equivalent)** for the NGN PPV platform, so that we can legally broadcast music and performance rights and proceed with the Phase 13 live streaming feature.

(New: PPV Expense Approval/Reconciliation) I need an audit queue to review and **Approve/Reject** submitted PPV Deductible Expenses, which automatically triggers a **Payout Hold** on the Gross Revenue until approved, so that the final **Net Splits** calculation is auditable and compliant.

(New: Critical Health Alert) I need the system to trigger a HIGH priority operational alert when the **P95 API Latency exceeds 250 milliseconds**, so that the Tech Team can immediately address systemic performance issues impacting the majority of the user experience (per M1 KPI).
I want the AI Writers & Campaign Assistant to draft chart write-ups and genre spotlights, so that I can rapidly produce high-quality content.
I want a human-in-the-loop workflow with AI drafts, so that I can review, edit, and track the publish vs. discard status of AI-generated content.
I want to use the AI Writers & Campaign Assistant to generate presser drafts and platform update posts, so that NGN can rapidly communicate official news and feature releases.
I want tools for chat rate limits, profanity filters, and a report/ban system, so that I can ensure a welcoming and inclusive community environment during live events.
I want a single-page application (SPA) frontend with Tailwind UI, so that I have a clean, fast, and modern browsing experience on any device.
I want to subscribe to NGN Premium, so that I can listen to PLN music and stations ad-free.
I want to purchase NGN Sparks, so that I can use micro-transaction tools like "What's My Genre?" and priority chat message boosts.
I want to create a Fan Subscription (Gold/Silver Tier), so that I can directly support an artist monthly and gain access to exclusive content.
I want to view my Spark balance in the persistent header and access a dedicated purchase workflow, so that I can easily monitor and replenish my AI micro-transaction currency.
I want a visible "Give Sparks" button on all relevant content (e.g., posts, stations, products, events), so that I can easily tip creators for their work and boost their engagement.

(New: Advanced Chart Filtering) I want the public Charts & Rankings page to include filters for **Niche Genre**, **Locality (City/Region)**, **Time Interval (Daily/Weekly)**, **Momentum (Biggest Movers)**, and **NGN Score Range**, so that I can easily discover emerging artists in my specific scene.
